# Grids

## Make grid

```{r}
#| eval: false
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
MUNICIPIOSgeo = st_read("data/Municipalities_geo.gpkg")
LISBON = MUNICIPIOSgeo |> filter(Municipality == "Lisboa") |> st_transform(crs = 3857)
```

TO make a grid we is the st_make_grid() function.

```{r}
GRID = LISBON |> st_make_grid(cellsize = 800)
mapview::mapview(GRID)
```
